TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExportAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that a type, property, field, or method provides a particular export.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under the default contract name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Methods that are marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor(System.String)> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor(System.Type)> method.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string contractName) cil managed

Docs.param: The contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under the specified contract name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Methods that are marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor(System.String)> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor(System.Type)> method.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type contractType) cil managed

Docs.param: A type from which to derive the contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under a contract name derived from the specified type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Methods that are marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor(System.String)> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute.%23ctor(System.Type)> method.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string contractName, class System.Type contractType) cil managed
Public Sub New (contractName As String, contractType As Type)

Docs.param: The contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the specified type under the specified contract name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContractName As String
public: property System::String ^ ContractName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute.
Docs.value: The contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute. The default value is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContractType As Type
public: property Type ^ ContractType { Type ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the contract type that is exported by the member that is marked by this attribute.
Docs.value: The type of export to be provided. The default value is , which means that the type will be obtained by looking at the type on the member that this export is attached to.
